loans.use: to buy materials to finish building her house and to install electricity

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase coconut and sugar at wholesale for her business.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica tiene 68 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de fruta partida desde hace mucho tiempo de forma ambulante. Ella es una mujer ejemplar quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento y mantener la economía  del hogar. Angélica desea construir un muro de piedra al rededor de la vivienda dado que cuando llueve el agua se mete y le genera insalubridad. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de piedra, arena, cemento, etc.
texts.en: Angélica is 68 years old and has made a living as a traveling fruit vendor for many years. She is an exemplary woman who does everything that she can to support her household's needs. Angélica wants to biuld a stone wall around her home, because when it rains, water gets in which is unhygienic. Therefore, she is requesting this loan through FUSAI to buy stone, sand, cement, etc.

loans.use: to buy stone, sand, cement, etc. to build a wall around her home.

loans.name: Virgen Asunta Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN ASUNTA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Victoria ella es soltera y tiene 51 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 1 año en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.


Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de leche, negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "Virgen Asunta", which is located in the Anta district, belonging to the province of Anta and the department of Cusco. 

The member Señora Victoria is single, 51 years old, and has two children. She works running her grocery store business, selling staple goods such as rice, sugar, milk, and oil. The member works from 8am until 6pm. She already has been in this line of work for a year and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand the business. The member asks for this loan to buy milk, sugar, oil, and rice. 

The other members work in other businesses, for example, selling milk, selling vegetables, running other grocery stores, or selling prepared food.

Victoria thanks those who form part of her dream through their contributions, and she promises to comply with the payment of fees within the established time.

loans.use: to purchase milk, sugar, oil, and rice.

loans.name: Hugo Amilcar

texts.es: Hugo de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos, los dos mayor trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, el posee una pequeña tienda ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de sopas, café, detergentes, huevos, golosinas, refrescos, etc. y así obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Hugo is 39 years old, he lives in his own home with his wife and their four kids. The two oldest work and help him economically. He has a small store located at his place of residence. The income from his sales allows him to take care of the expenses that arise at home. He is requesting a credit to purchase soups, coffee, detergents, eggs, candy, refreshments, etc. and in this way obtain better incomes.

loans.use: purchase soups, coffee, detergents, eggs, candy, refreshments, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 22 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riego, se dedica a la venta de pollos, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, la joven vive con sus abuelos en casa de ellos, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pollos por mayor asi como muestra en la fotografía para poder seguir con sus ventas y tener junto con sus abuelos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This young woman, whose face has been pixelated because she is 22 years old and lives in a high risk area, makes a living selling chickens.  Her business is located at her residence. She lives with her grandparents in a house they own.

She is requesting a loan to buy more chickens wholesale (see photograph) in order to continue with her sales so that she and her grandparents can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more chickens wholesale.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 53 years old and has ten children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Aida is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 8,500 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Aida has been farming rice for seven years now and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

She would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilzer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Solihamo

texts.ru:
Солихамо вместе с мужем на протяжении 3 лет занимается торговлей. У них имеется маленький магазин, где они продают  косметику, парфюмерию и другие разные вещицы. Солихамо нравится их бизнес, так как это основной доход семьи. 
Солихамо 51 год. Она вместе с мужем и тремя сыновьями живет в городе Куляб. В данный момент Солихамо обратилась за кредитом для покупки нового товара. Она хочет увеличить ассортимент парфюмерии и косметики, чтобы привлечь больше клиентов. Эта финансовая поддержка необходима им для развития торговли.
texts.en:
Solihamo and her husband have been involved in sales for 3 years. They have a small store, where they sell cosmetics, perfumes and other various items. Solihamo likes her business because it provides the primary income for the family. 

Solihamo is 51 years old. She lives with her husband and three sons in the town of Kulob. At the present time, Solihamo is requesting this loan to buy new merchandise. She wants to increase her selection of perfumes and cosmetics in order to attract more customers. This financial support is necessary for them to grow their sales.

loans.use: to buy a selection of perfumes and cosmetics

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine is an experienced agronomist from Margahovit village of the Lori region. She lives with her husband, her three little children, and her elderly and retired mother-in-law. To assist her husband in earning a living, Narine has been in cattle breeding, aviculture, breeding a livestock of pigs and piglets, and cultivation of potatoes and cabbage. Her husband sells the agricultural products in the local market. 

Narine currently wants to expand her agribusiness. She needs a loan of 1,500 USD to purchase forage for feeding the livestock. 

Narine and her family members rely on the goodwill of lenders, and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed amount for the loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Roxana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Roxana tiene 28 años de edad vive en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos estado civil soltero ella vive con su familia y tiene 5 hijos. 
Ella se dedica a la agricultura y solicita el credito para la compra de plantas de cacao y fertilizantes para sus siembras.
Ella realiza las compras en las  ciudades de Ventanas y Babahoyo los sueños y metas que tiene es tener su propio negoció y comprarse un terreno en los tiempos libres se dedica a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Roxana is 28 years old and lives in Ventana Canton, in Los Rios Province. She is unmarried and lives with her family. She has five children.

Roxana is a farmer and is requesting a loan to purchase cocoa plants and fertilizer for her cultivated land. She makes her purchases in the cities of Ventanas and Babahoyo. 

Her dreams and goals are to have her own business and to purchase land.

She dedicates her spare time to her children.

loans.use: to purchase cocoa plants and fertilizer.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es:
Marcelino es casado y tiene dos hijos un varón y una mujer que están en etapa escolar, vive en la casa propia donde cuenta con un ambiente y se encuentra el dormitorio y la cocina, baño, la  habitación es de adobe y el piso de cemento, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la  ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja de chófer con movilidad propia como trufi; el recorrido y ruta es desde la zona Achachicala, siendo su parada en la zona de Tembladerani de la Ciudad de La Paz  y la esposa también ayuda en el trabajo y al cuidado de los hijos,  ambos  colaboran en el pago de los servicios, comida y vestimenta, y educación de sus hijos. Marcelino quiere un credito para continuar con los arreglos de su vehiculo, el lciente no tiene a quien recurrir y por eso necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Marcelino is married and has two school-age children, a boy and a girl.  He lives in his own house, which has a living room, bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom.  The house is made of adobe with cement floors, and is located in the city of La Paz. 

Currently he works as a taxi driver with his own transportation on a fixed route from the Achachicala area; his stop is in the Tembladerani area of the city of La Paz.  His wife also helps with his work and with taking care of the children.  Together they pay for the utilities, food, clothing, and the children's education.

Marcelino wants a loan to keep up with the repairs on his vehicle.  He doesn't have anyone to go to, so he needs your help.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Oynabat

texts.ru:
Ойнабат жительница района Дж.Руми. Она замужем за животновода. Ее муж занимается разведением коров и быков. У Ойнабат трое маленьких детей. В возрасте 27 лет она занимается шитьем. Эту деятельность она начала два года назад, чтобы принести в дом новый источник дохода и помогать мужу с обеспечением семьи.
Сейчас Ойнабат нуждается в заемных средствах. Дело в том, что ее старый холодильник сломался и она не может себе позволить купить новый. Поэтому Ойнабат единственный выход видит в получении кредита. Ойнабат за счет суммы кредита хочет приобрести новый холодильник, чтобы не испортились продукты питания. Ваша поддержка ей очень необходима. Ойнабат будет выплачивать кредит за счет своего швейного бизнеса и за счет животноводческой деятельности мужа. Она верит, что мир не без добрых людей.
texts.en:
Oynabat is an inhabitant of the J.Rumi region. She is married to a livestock farmer. Her husband breeds cows and bulls. Oynabat has three small children. At the age of 27, she is engaged with sewing. She began this activity two years ago, in order to bring a new source of income to the home and to help her husband to support the family.

Now, Oynabat needs loan resources. The fact is that her old refrigerator broke down and she cannot afford to buy a new one. Therefore, the only way forward that Oynabat sees is through receiving a loan. With the loan sum, Oynabat wants to acquire a new refrigerator, in order to preserve food products. This support is very important to her. Oynabat will repay the loan through her sewing business and the livestock activities of her husband. She believes that the world is not without good people.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in shoes, pants, shirts, socks, etc.

loans.name: Momahol

texts.ru:
Момахол пожилая жительница района Шахритус. Ей 50 лет. Она активно занимается животноводческой деятельностью в своем селе. Ей помогают в деле муж-пенсионер и сын. Момахол живет на районе вместе с мужем, 29-летним сыном и невесткой. Ее сын является шеф-поваром в местном ресторане.
Момахол разводит скот, особенно маленьких телят в течение 4 лет. Сейчас она хотела бы увеличить поголовье своих скотов и с такой целью обратилась за кредитом. На запрашиваемую сумму Момахол собирается приобрести маленького теленка. Она нуждается в вашей поддержке.
texts.en: Momahol is an elderly resident of the Shahrituz district. She is 50 years old. She is actively involved in an animal husbandry business in her village. Her retired husband and son help her with the business. Momahol lives in the district with her husband, 29-year-old son and daughter-in-law. Her son is chef at a local restaurant. Momahol has been raising livestock, especially young calves, for 4 years. She now wants to increase her livestock headcount and is requesting a loan for this purpose. Momahol is planning to buy a young calf with the loan amount. She needs your support.

loans.use: to buy a calf in order to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru:
Зебинисо в возрасте 31 года имеет двух детей. Ее муж таксист и зарабатывает этим на жизнь. Сама Зебинисо занимается скотоводством. Уже два года как она разводит крупнорогатых скотин для продажи. Зебинисо обычно выгуливает скот на местном пастбище, где всегда есть свежая трава. С закупкой и продажей скотов ей помогает муж, так как в селе это мужское дело. 
Зебинисо хочет расширить деятельность. Она берет кредит для купли еще одного крупнрогатого скота для увеличения    их поголовья и для получения в дальнейшем большего прибыли. Этот кредит действительно важен для Зебинисо и ее семьи.
texts.en: Zebiniso is 31 years old and has two children. Her husband is a taxi driver and earns a living this way. Zebiniso is involved in animal husbandry. She has been raising cattle for sale for already two years. Zebiniso typically takes livestock to a local pasture, where there is always fresh grass. Her husband helps her with buying and selling livestock because this is a man's job in the village. Zebiniso wants to expand her business. She is requesting this loan to buy another cow in order to increase livestock headcount and earn more profit. This loan is truly important for Zebiniso and her family.

loans.use: to buy a cow in order to increase livestock headcount and earn more profit

loans.name: 4 De Marzo Group

texts.es:
Ruth es una mujer de 45 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos de 16 y 22 años, y su negocio es la venta de comida.
Ella es emprendedora, luchadora, constante, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en ‘El Torno’ que se encuentra aproximadamente a 70 kilometros de la ciudad y se caracteriza por “Las Cataratas del Jardín” estas maravillosas cataratas están dentro la influencia del Parque Nacional Amboró en la zona este del área.
Ruth es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello largo negro, su lengua materna es el español.(sentada a la izquierda, abrazando un bolsón, polera negra, bermuda de jean) Debido a su necesidad por mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia formó una banca de personas con negocios diferentes y necesidades similares para solicitar un préstamo y ampliar sus actividades comerciales. Su negocio es la venta de comida, específicamente platos típicos del lugar, como; el majadito de charque, locro carretero cruceño, Pacumutu, sopa de maní, etc.
Su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales, ella desea darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, realizando la compra de insumos de cocina por mayor como; arroz, fideo, papa y también renovar algunos de sus utensilios de cocina, como; ollas y cubiertos.
Es por esos motivos que Ruth solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de cocina por mayor y con los beneficios darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Ruth is a 45 year old, married woman with two children ages 16 and 22. She is in the business of food sales. She is an entrepreneur and a fighter who is consistent, responsible and hard working. She has her business in "El Torno" which is located approximately 70 kilometers from the city and is characterized by the "Cataratas del Jardin" (the Garden's Waterfalls) which are marvelous waterfalls located within the influence of the Amboro National Park in the eastern zone of the area. 
Ruth is dark-skinned, of medium stature, with long black hair and her native tongue is Spanish. She is seated on the left, holding a bag, with a black blouse and jean shorts.
In light of her need to improve the quality of life of her family, she formed a bank of people with different businesses and with similar needs to request a loan and amplify their commercial activities. 
Her business is in food sales, specifically traditional plates of the region such as: "majadito de charque" (meat,rice, egg and plantain plate), "locro carretero cruceño" (an energizing stew), "Pacumutu" (steak and vegetable skewers), peanut soup, etc.
Her dream is for her children to be professionals. She wishes to give her family a better quality of life by purchasing kitchen supplies at wholesale such as: rice, noodles, potatoes and also renovate some of her kitchen utensils such as pots and silverware. This is the reason that Ruth is requesting a loan to purchase the kitchen supplies at wholesale and be able to, with the benefits, provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase kitchen supplies at wholesale and with the benefits provide for her family a better quality of life.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: invest in: pants, blouses, skirts, socks, body lotions, perfumes, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Mwamtunga

texts.en:
Mwamtunga is married and has three children, all of whom attend school. She lives at a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Mwamtunga has operated a food selling business, making dumplings, flat bread, and sometimes baking bread to sell. She sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the Kshs 50,000, she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat, and sugar for her business. 

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat, and sugar

loans.name: Deborah

texts.en:
Deborah is 44 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell dry goods business in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 40,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of dry goods to sell.

Deborah has borrowed and paid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell dry goods for nine years, and also earns an income from motorcycle transport.

Deborah aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of dry goods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a cowshed

loans.name: Chrisdine

texts.en:
Chrisdine is 36 years old and married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Chrisdine has borrowed and paid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell charcoal business for three years, and also earns an income from a general store.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Blanca Araceli

texts.es:
Blanca de 51 años de edad, estudio hasta 9° grado, es madre soltera de 3 hijos que vive con ella, uno trabaja y 2 de ellos estudian un técnico y el otro asiste a bachillerato, ella es la que se encarga de sus hijos.  

Desde hace 6 años se dedica al comercio de venta de ropa, aprendió por la necesidad que tenía más que todo por iniciativa propia, vende sus productos en la zonas más cercanas de su comunidad y se va en bus desde las 6 am a 3 pm. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, para comprar ropa de mujer y de niños, faldas, camisas y ropa interior y seguir vendiendo para tener los ingresos para invertirlo en la educación de sus hijos y solventar los gastos del hogar. 

Espera en un futuro tener un local en el mercado y vender además de ropa; frutas y verduras, trabajar más duro para que cuando sus hijos vayan a la Universidad poder ayudarles sin problemas.
texts.en:
Blanca is 51 years old, studied until 9th grade, and is a single mother of 3 children who live with her. One of her children works, and the other two are in school; one to be a technician, and the other is in high school. She supports all of her children. She has been selling clothes for 6 years, which she learned because she needed work, and through her own initiative. She sells her products in areas close to her community, and travels by bus from 6 am to 3 pm.

The loan she is requesting is to buy women's and children's clothing, including skirts, shirts and underwear, so that she can keep selling and make sufficient income to invest in her children's education and to pay the household expenses. For the future, she hopes to have a shop in a market and sell more than just clothes, but also fruits and vegetables. She will work even harder so that when he children go to University she will be able to support them without any issues.

loans.use: to buy women's and children's clothing, including skirts, shirts and underwear, so that she can keep selling and make sufficient income to invest in her children's education.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit is an experienced farmer from Zovasar Village. She lives with her husband, and they both are engaged in cattle raising, aviculture and the cultivation of wheat and potato. Anahit sells the agricultural products in the local market, which is an important source of income for the family. 

As the autumn is progressing, Anahit needs to make some investments in her agribusiness for it to function in a sustainable way. She needs a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase five piglets and forage for feeding the livestock (barley and grass). As this is Anahit's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who haven’t had access to credit products before, because they have no credit history. Anahit and her husband rely on the goodwill of the lenders, and will be very thankful to them for their support.

loans.use: to pay for five piglets and forage for feeding the livestock (barley and grass)

loans.name: Dastagul

texts.ru: Дастагул, так зовут эту умелую и способную женщину из маленького городка Дангара. Ей 27 лет. Она живет в городке с мужем и двумя дочерьми. Ее муж работает на стройке. Сама Дастагул предоставляет услуги швеи. Она занята в этой сфере деятельности уже 4 года. Дастагул сейчас решила расширить свою деятельность и таким образом увеличить семейный доход. На сумму запрашиваемого кредита Дастагул собирается купить новую модернизированную швейную машинку, с помощью которой она также будет делать вышивки на платьях по заказу клиенток. Дастагул очень хочет улучшить условия проживания и кредит поможет ей в этом расширив ее деятельность.
texts.en: Dastagul is the name of this talented and capable woman from a small town of Dangara. She is 27 years old. She lives in this town with her husband and two daughters. Her husband works at a construction site. Dastagul provides seamstress services. She has been involved in this business for 4 years already. Dastagul now decided to expand her business and increase the family's income. Dastagul is planning to use the requested loan amount to buy a new, modern sewing machine, with the help of which she would be able to make embroideries on dresses per her clients' requests. Dastagul really wants to improve her living conditions, and this loan will help her with this goal through expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy a new, modern sewing machine

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es: Marta de 64 años de edad vive encasa propia con sui esposo, desde hace varios años ella posee una pequeña tienda en su casa, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos y los buenos precios, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como: huevos, golosinas, granos básicos, refrescos, etc. y asi obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Marta, 64 years old, lives with her husband in a house they own.  For several years she has had a small store in her home.  She has many customers because of the variety of her products and her good prices.

She is requesting a loan in order to purchase more merchandise, such as eggs, sweets, basic grains, soft drinks, etc., and thus improve her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase eggs, sweets, basic grains, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Douglas Antonio

texts.es: Douglas de 32 años de edad desde hace varios años posee un taller de enderezado y pintura ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Douglas vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de pintura, barniz, aceites, y demás herramientas para seguir con su trabajo y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Douglas is 32 and has had an auto repair and paint shop for several years, located at his house. This source of income enables him to pay for part of the household's expenses. Douglas lives in a house of his own with his wife and his son. He asks for a loan to buy paint, varnish, oil, and other materials and tools he needs for his trade. His goal is to earn more money in order to give his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy the materials he needs to repair cars.

loans.name: Reina Arely

texts.es: Reina de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos quienes estudian actualmente, ella posee una venta de tortillas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa, tiene mucha clientela por la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal, y asi poder continuar con sus ventas y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Reina is 31 years old and lives in a house of her own with two children who go to school. She sells tortillas at her house. She has many customers because she treats them well. She asks for a loan in order to buy sweetcorn by the quintals and lime in order to keep her business going and improve her sales.

loans.use: to buy sweetcorn and lime.

loans.name: Erlina

texts.en:
Erlina is 56 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Erlina is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Erlina has been pig fattening for five years, and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to  save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Annie works hard to support her family.

Annie has a fishing business in the Philippines, and she earns additional income from pig fattening. She is borrowing PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy additional fishing nets and other fishing materials for her fishing business.

Annie has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing nets and other fishing materials

loans.name: Ermelita

texts.en:
Ermelita is 53 years old and married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell dry seaweed business in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of dry seaweed to sell.

Ermelita has borrowed and paid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell dry seaweed business for two years, and also earns an income from a general store.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of dry seaweed

loans.name: Denyse

texts.en:
Denyse is 38 years old. She is married with 5 children, ages between 19 and 7 years; all of them go to school. She sells fish, and has been running a business for the past 10 years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more fish to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: To buy more fish

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe works hard to support her family. Fe is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional fishing nets and other fishing materials.

Fe has been in this business for 2 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fishing nets and other fishing materials.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 60 years old and married with nine children.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Lucia is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Lucia has been farming rice for ten years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 29 years old. She is married with one child who is one year old. She has a bar and has been running the business for the past three years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more beer and soda for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more beer and soda for sale.

loans.name: Josepha

texts.en:
Josepha is 31 years old. She is married with 3 children aged between 8 and 2 years, two of them go to school. 

She sells shoes for young people and has been selling for the past 2 years. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more young people's shoes for sale. 

The profits form the business will be used to buy a new house.

loans.use: to buy more shoes for sale.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Joy works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling furniture in the Philippines, and Joy also earns income from food vending. 

Joy is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy lumber and other furniture shop supplies for her business.

Joy has sustained her business with nine previous loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy lumber and other furniture shop supplies.

loans.name: Bintisaid

texts.en:
Bintisaid is a married woman with three kids, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Bintisaid operates a grocery vegetables selling stall; she sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of the high cost of transportation to her place of operation. She dreams of expanding, and having a motorcycle transport business in the future. 

With the Kshs 25,000 she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cocoa beans for resale

loans.name: Ana Ides

texts.es:
Ana de 22 años de edad, estudio hasta 4° grado, está acompañada y su pareja es albañil, tiene 2 hijos que vive con ellos y el mayor asiste  a kínder y nadie más vive con ellos.  

La mayor parte de su vida se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos, los fines de semana hace panes con pollo y los vende en el campo de la comunidad, y una vez a la semana sale a las comunidades cercanas a vender, su horario es de 7 am a 1 pm. 

El crédito lo necesita para construir una pila y baño, comprara bloque, cemento y arena, con esto se sentirá más a gusto y que tendrá mayor privacidad. 

El sueño  a futuro es tener una casa más confiable para que sus hijos crezcan en un ambiente saludable y tener un empleo donde tenga ingresos mensuales para mantener  sus hijos y ayudarle a su pareja con los gastos.
texts.en:
Ana is 22 years old. She studied up to 4th grade. She is married, and her partner is a mason. They have two children who live with them. The older one attends kindergarten, and no one else lives with them.  

For the majority of her life, she has worked doing domestic chores. On the weekends, she makes bread with chicken, and sells this in the fields of the community. Once a week she goes out into the nearby communities to sell, from 7am until 1pm. 

She needs this loan to build a sink and a bathroom. She will buy blocks, cement, and sand, and with this will feel more comfortable and will have more privacy. 

Her future dream is to have a safer and more secure house so that her children might grow up in a more healthy environment. She also dreams of having a job where she earns a monthly income to support her kids and to help her husband with the family's expenses.

loans.use: to build a sink and a bathroom. She will buy blocks, cement, and sand, and with this will feel more comfortable and will have more privacy.

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru:
Хосият замужем за мастера-ювелира. Она работает в мастерской мужа вместе с ним. Уже 3 года как они занимаются ремонтом, изготовлением и продажей золотых и серебряных украшений, таких как национальные таджикские серьги, цепочки, браслеты, кольца и т.д. Хосият научилась этому делу у своего мужа. У них имеется два мастерских. Один находится при дворе их дома, а второй расположен на рынке района.
Хосият с мужем и двумя сыновьями живет в районе Дангара. Ей 32 года. 
Ювелирное дело является их семейным бизнесом и единственным источником дохода. Хосият сейчас запрашивает кредит.  Им необходимо закупить серебро для изготовления серебряных украшений. Они нуждаются в этом кредите.
texts.en:
Khosiyat is married to a master jeweler. She works with her husband in his workshop. For three years they have been doing repairs, manufacturing, and sale of gold and silver jewelry, such as national Tajik earrings, chains, bracelets, rings, and the like. Khosiyat learned this trade from her husband. They have two workshops. One is located in the yard of their home and the second is located in the regional market.

Khosiyat lives with her husband and two sons in the Dangara region. She is 32 years old.

The jewelry trade is their their family business and the only source of income. Khosiyat is now requesting a loan. They need to purchase silver for the production of silver jewelry. They need this loan.

loans.use: to purchase silver for the production of silver jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Maria Fe

texts.en:
Maria Fe is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy an additional fishing net.

Maria Fe has been in this business for four years and she also earns more income by running a general store.

Maria Fe has sustained her business through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy an additional fishing net.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is 56 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Margarita is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Margarita has been raising pigs for 15 years and also earns income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly to attainment her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Emile

texts.en:
Emile is 31 years old. He is not married. He sells shoes and has been working in this business for the past five years. 

With the loan, he would like to buy more shoes to sell. The profits from the business will be used for reinvestment.

loans.use: To buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Nelfa

texts.en:
Nelfa is 59 years old and married, with one child.

She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. Nelfa is borrowing PHP 10,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) in order to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Nelfa has been farming rice for 20 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Jhoana

texts.en:
Jhoana is 38 years old and married with four children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of household goods to sell like soap, milk, sugar, etc.

Jhoana has borrowed and repaid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns an income from fishing.

Jhoana aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more household goods to sell like soap, milk, sugar, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase new shoes for her store.

loans.name: Methodius

texts.en:
Methodius is a 52-year-old man, married, with six children, living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. 

Methodius wants the loan to buy more cocoa beans to sell. He has a big cocoa garden and his business is the buying and selling of cocoa. He is very hard-working and his business has helped him to take his children to school. He started this business in 2006 and he sells to the local cocoa companies. 

He hopes to complete his commercial house, despite the challenge of unpredictable weather changes.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Kultuma

texts.en:
Kultuma is a married mother of one child. She lives in her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past two years, she has operated a clothing sales business, selling from door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge in the high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan of KES 50,000 that she is requesting, she wants to purchase two bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase two bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Bunyansaigi Abagambakamu Group

texts.en:
Sylivia is a 30 year old married man with one child living in Fort Portal Uganda. She runs a drug store and has a goal of supporting her family. 

She is facing the challenge of having limited space to handle so many customers who flock her shop.  Sylvia also wants to have a modern drug shop and expand her business to new areas. 

Sylvia needs a loan to increase her stock of items to sell.

loans.use: to stock her drug store.

loans.name: Tolgonai

texts.ru: Толгонай, 62 года, замужем. Имеет 4 взрослых детей. Семья очень дружная и уважаемая в селе. Толгонай много лет проработала в школьной столовой, сейчас она на пенсии, занимается животноводством и полеводством. Бизнес Толгонай начала в 1984 году почти с нуля, однако на сегодняшний день она успешный фермер своего небольшого хозяйства, в котором у нее имеется: 1 дойная корова с теленком, 10 овец. Также у нее в наличии есть земельный надел мерою 0,40 ГА, где она ежегодно выращивает морковь и картофель. Ежемесячная прибыль Толгонай составляет до 15,000 сом (KGS). Всю прибыль от бизнеса она старается вкладывать в развитие бизнеса. Толгонай обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом, в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 коров. Она хочет увеличить поголовье скота и улучшить условия жизни.
texts.en: Tolgonai is 62 years old, married and has 4 adult children. Her family is very friendly and respected in the village. For many years, Tolgonai worked at a school cafeteria and is now retired, and involved in animal husbandry and farming. Tolgonai started with business in 1984 almost with nothing, however, today, she is a successful farmer on her small farm, where she has 1 dairy cow with a calf and 10 sheep. She also has a 0.40 hectare land plot, where she annually grows carrots and potatoes. Tolgonai's monthly profit amounts to 15,000 som (KGS). She tries to invest all of her profit into developing her business. Tolgonai requested a loan in the amount of 80,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy 2 cows. She wants to increase her livestock headcount and improve her life.

loans.use: to buy two cows in order to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la carapor tener 24 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, vive con su esposa, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal en el y a la siembra de granos básicos, el joven se ha dedicado a esta actividad desde su infancia ya que no tenía otra forma de generar sus ingresos, con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar las necesidades de su hogar, el solicita un crédito para la compra de trasmallos porque los que tiene no le sirven y asi continuar con su única fuente de trabajo para tener junto con su esposa un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: The borrower is 24 years old and lives in a high-risk area, hence the blurring of the photo. He lives with his wife and is an artisanal fisherman who also grows basic grains. He has been doing this since he was a child, as it is the only source of income that was available to him. He pays for household expenses thanks to what he earns from this activity. He asks for a loan to buy driftnets, since the ones he has are no longer of any use. This will enable him to keep in business so as to improve his family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy driftnets.

loans.name: Irma Yoland

texts.es: Irma de 54 años de edad vive con sus tres hijos,  ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y venta de tortillas, con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar las necesidades que se le presentan en su familia, Irma solicita un crédito para la compra de maíz y cal por mayor, y asi poder darle a su familia un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Irma is 54 years old and lives with her three children. She sells cosmetics and tortillas. With what she earns from her sales, she manages to meet her family's needs. 

Irma is asking for a loan in order to buy maize and lime at wholesale. In this way, she can give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy maize and lime at wholesale

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia Gregoria se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de jugos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar manzanas, naranjas y uvas.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en: Gregoria continues selling home-made juice. She works from 8 am to 6 pm, and her goal is to improve her lot in life. She asks for this loan to purchase oranges, apples, and grapes. She is happy with this loan and promises to be punctual in her repayments.

loans.use: to buy apples, oranges, and grapes.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia Celia se sigue dedicando al negocio de bazar, la socia vende regalos y adornos ,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y el va muy bien,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de bazar. La socia solicita el  credito para comprar adornos, peluches y regalos

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Celia still works running her store. She sells gifts and decorations. She has been in business for several years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to expand her business in order to improve her lot in life. She is requesting this loan to buy decorations, stuffed animals, and other gift items. She is happy about the loan and promises to comply with her payment terms.

loans.use: to buy decorations and stuffed animals.

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es:
La socia  Ubaldina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida,la socia sigue teniendo su restaurant, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia hace paltos como pollo al horno, sopas entre otros, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, pollo y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Ubaldina continues with her business of selling food. She has a restaurant where she makes different meals like baked chicken, soups, and other dishes. Her aim is to improve her lot in life. Her dream is to have a bigger shop. Ubaldina is requesting a loan to buy vegetables, chicken, and meat. She is pleased with the loan and promises to pay her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken, and meat.

loans.name: Merla

texts.en:
Merla is 55 years old and married with eight children, three of whom are in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell.

Merla has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Merla aspires to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 30-year-old, hard-working man, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

He owns a restaurant as his main source of income and does retail to boost his income. He started the businesses with a hope of earning a living. He faces challenges of defaulters and price fluctuation. Besides that, he hopes of buying more plots of land to construct a permanent house. 

Robert needs a loan to invest in his business by buying food to sell, like rice and posho.

loans.use: to invest in his business by buying foods to sell, like rice and posho.

loans.name: Lyova

texts.ru:
Лева — предприниматель-сельскохозяйственник. С момента вложения в развитие своего бизнеса суммы, полученной от КИВА, Лева приобрел б/у автомобиль, чтобы вывозить продукцию на рынок, а также сделал отопление в одной большой теплице. В целом также увеличился его доход в этом году. Кроме огорода Лева еще работает на стройке — строит дома, гаражи, делает ремонты. Недавно с ним произошел несчастный случай — он получил повреждение лица после падения с высоты — был разбит нос, лицо. Пришлось некоторое время побыть на больничном. Сейчас все нормализовалось, он снова работает и обеспечивает семью. Много средств уходит на учебу дочери — старшая учится в вузе в Запорожье. 
На сумму в 40 000 гривен Лева планирует сам сделать котел отопления для теплиц, чтобы отапливать больше теплиц.
texts.en:
Lyova is an entrepreneur and agriculturalist. Since investing in the development of his business a sum received from Kiva, Lyova purchased an automobile, in order to transport products to the market, and also put heating in one his large greenhouses. On the whole, he increased his income this year in this way. In addition to the garden, Lyova also works in construction — building homes and garages, and making repairs.

Recently, he has an accident — he was injured after falling from a height — with a broken nose, face. It was necessary to be on sick leave for a time. Now everything is normal; he is working again and is supporting the family. A lot of money is spent on the daughters' schooling — the elder is studying at the university in Zaporozhye.

With the sum of 40,000 hryvnia, Lyova plans to make himself a boiler for heating greenhouses.

loans.use: to make and install a boiler/heater for his greenhouses.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La Sra. Carmen tiene 37 años, tiene cinco hijos pero solo 2 viven con ella, el resto ya es independiente a ella.
Carmen y su marido trabajan en la ciudad de Mariano R. Alonso; viaja tres veces por semana, es empleada doméstica, pero esta estudiando para ser repostera profesional, está estudiando en un instituto para perfeccionarse de a poco en los días libres que tiene, le gusta cocinar y además realiza tortas y masas dulces por pedido, solicita el préstamo para pagarse otro módulo de estudios y comprarse una batidora, lo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Sra. Carmen is 37 years old. She has five children, but only two live with her. The others are already independent.

Carmen and her husband work in the city of Mariano R. Alonso. She travels three times a week because she is employed as a household domestic. However, she is also studying to become a professional pastry maker. Carmen is studying at an institute on her days off so that she can gradually improve herself. She enjoys cooking, especially making cakes and sweet breads by request.

Carmen is requesting a loan in order to pay for another set of coursework and to buy a blender, which will be of great help.

loans.use: to pay for her coursework and to buy a blender for her culinary studies.

loans.name: Flor Maria

texts.es: Flor de 38 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y con su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de productos enchapados de oro(cadenas, aritos, pulseras) lo cual también es por catalogo, tiene 5 años de experiencia trabajando, con lo que gana de su ventas logra solventar las necesidades que se le presentan en su hogar, Flor solicita un crédito para comprar más producto por mayor para su comercialización y asi poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Flor is 38 years old and lives with her ​​life partner and her daughter. She sells gold plated products (chains, earrings, bracelets), also by catalogue. She has 5 years of experience working. With what she earns from her sales she is able to meet her household expenses, 

Flor is applying for a loan to buy more products at wholesale for future sale and thus be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy gold plated products (chains, earrings, bracelets) at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Celine

texts.en:
Celine is 29 years old. She is married with one child who is four years old and does not yet go to school. She sells clothes, and she has been running this business for the past two years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more skirts, shorts and shirts for sale. The profits will be used to reinvest in the business and to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To buy more skirts, shorts and shirts for sale.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 32 years old and married with five children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell.

Mary Grace has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from fishing.

Mary Grace aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo and groceries to sell

loans.name: Winny

texts.en:
Winny, 26, started farming from scratch in 2010. Today, the mother of two has grown her business into profitability. On her one acre farm, she grows tea, bananas and grass. Her primary income source is tea. She states, "Tea generates sustainable income, but marketing it is a bit of a challenge." 

Most farmers don't need to market their tea produce because they sell to the same factory every season. This monopolistic relationship is, of course, at their expense. Unlike other farmers, Winny has another option: poultry. 

She is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to purchase poultry. The brood of hens she will acquire will lay eggs for hatching and sale. The poultry business requires little marketing because the more or less homogeneous poultry products are in high demand throughout the year. 

Your loan will help this farmer not only to be less reliant on a single product but also to uplift the lives of her family members through increased income and improved diet.

loans.use: to purchase poultry

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay his tuition and travel expenses.

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
As a single parent of four children, Mylene works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from fishing. Mylene is borrowing PHP 11,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell through her buy-and-sell charcoal business.

Mylene has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Reina Leticia

texts.es: Reina tiene 35 años de edad vive en Ventanas provincia de los Ríos estado civil soltera vive con sus 6 hijos. Se dedica a la siembra de maíz y mani con el dinero del crédito podra sembrar y comprar líquidos y abonos. Las compra realiza en Ventanas su sueño es tener su propio negocio, los desafios a los que se enfrenta es las enfermedades,en los tiempos libres le gusta ir  de paseo ver televisión y dedicarse a sus hijos.
texts.en: Reina is 35 years old and lives in Ventanas in De los Ríos Province.  She is single and lives with her six children.  She grows corn and peanuts for a living; with the money from this loan she will be able to plant and buy liquids and fertilizers.  She does her buying in Ventanas.  Her dream is to have her own business; the challenges she faces are diseases; in her free time she likes to go on walks, watch television, and spend time with her children.

loans.use: to buy supplies and to plant peanuts

loans.name: Abdusamad

texts.ru: Абдусамад  мужчина 30 лет ,женат,отец двоих детей. Абдусамад в течение 12 лет занимается продажей сухофруктов.Абдусамад имеет маленький сад,где выращивает фрукты и ягоды,такие как урюк,вишню,изюм,изюм с косточкой,хурма и многое другое.После сбора фруктов, он сушит их на солнце. После переработки Абдусамад продает сухофрукты на рынке. Сухофрукты хорошо скупаются. Так как Абдусамад имеет всего несколько деревьев,этого товара не хватает .Поэтому Абдусамад покупает оптом сухофрукты и продает их . Абдусамад - молодой отец и он хочет накопить деньги для получения образования своим детям,так как понимает,что без образования в нынешнее время ничего не добьешься.Он планирует купить новую партию сухофруктов ,но на данный момент не имеет нужной суммы.Поэтому Абдусамад обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой.Абдусамад заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Abdusamad is a man of 30, who is married and the father of two children. Over the course of 12 years, Abdusamad has been trading dried fruits. Abdusamad has a small garden, where he grows fruits and berries, such as apricots, cherries, grapes, grapes with stones, persimmons and many more. After the fruit harvest, he dries them in the sun. After preparation, Abdusamad sells the dried fruits in the market. Dried fruits sell well. Since Abdusamad has only a few trees, there is not enough product. Therefore Abdusamad buys wholesale dried fruits and sells them.

Abdusamad is a young father and he wants to save money for his children's education, since he understand that having no education at the present time will get you nowhere. He plans to buy a new parcel of dried fruits, but currently does not have the needed amount. Therefore, Abdusamad applied to MDO Arvand for financial support. Abdusamad thanks MDO Arvand in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to buy dried fruits.

loans.name: Maryana

texts.ru:
Маряна замужем. У нее трое детей. Маряна работает бухгалтером в военной части на протяжении 7 лет. Она  трудолюбивая и отзывчивая.

Старшая дочь Маряны выходит замуж, поэтому они хотят сделать ремонт в квартире. Маряна вместе с мужем переедут туда жить, а дочка будет жить  в доме. 

Маряна просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 15 000 гривен на ремонт квартиры. Маряна хочет провести отопление: нужно купить котел, батареи и трубы. Благодаря кредиту она сможет улучшить жилищные условия семьи.
texts.en:
Maryana is married and has three children. Maryana works as a bookkeeper in a military unit for the last seven years. She is hardworking and responsive.

Maryana's eldest daughter is getting married, therefore they want to make repairs on their apartment. Maryana and her husband will move to the apartment to live, and their daughter will live in the house.

Maryana is asking for a loan of 15,000 hryvnia for apartment repairs. Maryana wants to purchase heating: needs to buy a boiler, batteries and pipes. Thanks to the loan, she will be able to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy pipes, radiators and a boiler for her apartment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks, and iron to build a room in his home.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando de 44 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el posee un molino de nixtamal en el caserío y también es agricultor cultiva maíz y frijol,  con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar las necesidades que se le presentan en su hogar, Armando solicita un crédito para poder invertir más en el negocio, compra cuchillas, fajas, discos, etc. para el molino y poder seguir trabajando y asi poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Armando is 44 years old and lives with his wife and their two children.  He has a corn mill in the village and he also farms corn and beans, which brings him sales and allows him to pay for the needs of his household.  Armando is requesting a loan to invest in his business, to buy blades, belts, disks, etc. for the mill and to be able to keep working and thereby be able to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy blades, belts, disks, etc. for his mill

loans.name: Ñepytyvo Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Ñepytyvo está en su ciclo número 1º del programa de comité de mujeres, que quiere decir ayudarse, y es por ello que ellas se unieron para que por medio de esa ayuda mutua puedan ir creciendo. Además están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, que les ayudará a poder conocer la situación de cada una y conforme a ello mejorar sus vidas.
Maria, una de las integrantes, es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, comenta que todos los días empieza a trabajar desde muy tempranas horas del día,  ya que prepara las comidas que ella misma sale a vender de manera ambulante. Se ha hecho de muy buena clientela, ya que sus comidas son muy ricas.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar los insumos que necesita para seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser verduras, carne, condimentos, hortalizas y demás, de manera a poder seguir con su microemprendimiento. Todas están agradecidas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group “Ñepytyvo” is in its first loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. The members say that they want to help themselves. For this reason, they have joined together so that they can provide mutual assistance and be able to grow. In addition, they have taken the poverty elimination survey, which helps them become familiar with their individual situations so that they can make changes to improve their lives.

Maria is one of the members who is a hardworking and determined individual. She says that she begins her work every day in the early morning hours. Maria prepares food that she sells as a street vendor. She has already established a good clientele because her food is extremely delicious.

Maria is requesting a loan in order to buy the supplies that she needs for making her dishes. These include greens, meat, condiments, vegetables, and other items. As a result, she will be able to continue her work as a micro-entrepreneur. All of the members are grateful for the opportunity they have received.

loans.use: to buy greens, meat, condiments, vegetables, and other supplies for her food business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cooking utensils and use the profits to pay her baby's expenses

loans.name: Nerisa

texts.en:
Nerisa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Nerisa has been in this business for 3 years. Nerisa earns additional income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Joseline

texts.en:
Joseline is a 24-year-old, married woman, with two children, living in Fort Portal, Uganda. 

She is a retailer and her main hardship is defaulters. Besides that, she hopes to build a permanent house and have a healthy family. 

Joseline needs a loan to buy omo, sodas, pads, matchboxes, and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy omo, sodas, pads, matchboxes, and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean is 34 years old, married, and has two children, one of whom attends school. He operates a shop, which he has been doing for six years. 

Jean requested a loan, which he will use to buy more sugar, cooking oil, and baking powder to sell. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, cooking oil, and baking powder to sell

loans.name: Wiñay Huayna Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “WIÑAY HUAYNA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Zoila ella es casada y tiene 42 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio  de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.
Los socios que están pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de huevos, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de tejidos.
texts.en:
These members are part of the Communal Bank “Wiñat Huayna” which is located in the District of Cusco in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

Sra. Zoila is 42 years old, married, and has two children. She works at her grocery business where she sells basic necessity products such as rice, sugar, milk, and cookies. Zoila works from 8:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M. She has been in this business for five years and is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her grocery business. She is requesting a loan in order to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.

The members who appear separately from the group photo had their pictures taken after the meeting because they had requested permission to arrive late for work reasons. Other group members engage in businesses such as selling eggs, selling clothes, operating a grocery store, and selling woven articles.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es:
El socio Adrian se sigue dedicando al negocio de bazar y tambien el socio vende artesania,el socio vende regalos y peluches,el socio por medio de estos negocios quiere salir adelante.El socio solicita el credito para comprar adornos y peluches.

El socio se siente agradecido  por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Adrian continues with his retail stall selling handicrafts, gifts, and stuffed animals. These sales are how he makes his living. He is requesting this loan so that he can buy decorations and stuffed animals. 

Adrian is grateful for this loan and is committed to repaying on time.

loans.use: buy decorations and stuffed animals for resale

loans.name: Dora Angelica

texts.es:
La socia Dora Angelica se sigue dedicando al negocio de brosteria, la socia vende pollos brosters, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar pollo y papas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member, Dora Angelica, continues managing her rotisserie chicken business.  She sells rotisserie chickens, and works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  She already has eight years in this business and it is going very well.  Her dream is to have a restaurant.  She is requesting the loan to purchase products for cooking chicken and French fries.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase products for cooking chicken and French fries.

loans.name: Callixte

texts.en: Callixte is 34 years old. He is not married. He has a shop and has been running a business for the past 5 years. After getting his loan, he would like to buy more sugar, rice, cooking oil and soaps for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, rice, cooking oil and soaps for sale.

loans.name: Rosal

texts.en:
Rosal is 43 years old and single with three children.

She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Rosal is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Rosal has been in pig fattening for 5 years and also earns additional income from fishing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream which is to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en:
Nelia is 45 years old and married with seven children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

Nelia has borrowed and paid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell charcoal business for 3 years and also earns an income from a general store.

Nelia aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Grace Jolly

texts.en: Grace Jolly used the previous loan to pay school fees for her children. She is still in the same business of decorating and is working hard to buy a car and build a permanent house. She faces challenges of customers defaulting her and her business being seasonal. She has asked for another loan to buy decorating equipment for boosting her business and to serve her customers better.

loans.use: to buy decorating equipment.

loans.name: Rashid

texts.en: Rashid is a 24-year-old married man. He used the previous loan to buy iron rods and bars to make hinges and mold different shapes for sale. He has been in the same business of blacksmithing for the last 8 years. He has faced challenges of self injury and losses. He has a vision of establishing a hardware shop. Rashid needs a loan to buy iron rods to mold different shapes to sell.

loans.use: to buy iron rods to mold different shapes to sell.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.en: Ronald used the previous loan to repair his motorcycle that had broken down due to the bad roads. He is still dealing in his agricultural business alongside  transportation and dairy farming businesses. He faces challenges of price fluctuation, poor roads, and a limited market. However, he hopes to expand his business by buying land. Ronald needs a loan to buy milk to sell.

loans.use: to buy milk to sell.

loans.name: Enid

texts.en: Enid used the previous loan to buy chicken feeds and feeding troughs. She runs a poultry farm as her business and she is also involved in tailoring and design where she gets her additional income. Her motive for joining the business world was to develop and sustain herself. She needs a loan to pay school fees for her children. Her dream is to educate her children to university. Defaulters and delays in payments are the challenges affecting her performance.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 37-year-old married man with 4 children living in Fort Portal Uganda. He deals in metal fabrication, the business he started with a vision of employing himself. He faces the challenge of weather changes. He has hopes of buying a car and building a good house for his family to live in. Joseph needs a loan to buy metal rods and bars to make doors and windows.

loans.use: to buy metal rods and bars to make doors and windows.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick used the previous loan to complete building his video hall. His dream is to own a fully-fledged video hall (a small cinema, showing videos or television broadcasts) in the next three years. 

For five years, Patrick has been into videography and photography and the business is still booming. His major challenges have been unsettled debts and electricity, which is on and off. 

Patrick needs a loan to buy DSTV and stock beer, soda, and waragi to sell.

loans.use: to buy DSTV and stock beer, soda, and waragi  to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, nails and other items to repair the walls of her home.

loans.name: La Fortaleza Del Sur Group

texts.es:
Carmela es una mujer de 36 años de edad, soltera, madre de dos niños de 1, 2 años, y su negocio es la venta de productos médicos naturales.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, constante, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante en las diferentes ferias y zonas comerciales de su ciudad.
Debido a la necesidad de abastecer a sus dos hijos y cubrir sus gastos, ella formó una banca de personas con negocios diferentes y necesidades similares para solicitar un préstamo. Ella es de tez morena, cabello corto negro, su lengua materna es el español (segunda de la izquierda con vestido largo floreado) y su negocio es la venta de productos nutricionales para deportistas. Ella sueña con tener su casa propia para el bienestar de su familia y de sus niños, y desea utilizar el préstamo para aumentar su capital de trabajo.
Es por esos motivos que Carmela solicita un préstamo para aumentar su capital de trabajo y con los beneficios mejorar la calidad de vida de sus niños.
texts.en:
Carmela is a single woman of 36 years old and is the mother of two boys of 1 and 2. She makes a living selling natural medical products. She is a good mother and a enterprising, persevering, responsible and very hard-working woman. She takes her mobile business to the different markets and shopping areas of her city. 

Driven by her need to provide for her two sons and cover their expenses, she formed a communal bank with people who have different businesses but similar needs in order to apply for a loan together. In the photo she is second from the left and is wearing a long flowery dress. She has a dark complexion, short black hair and her mother tongue is Spanish. Her business is selling nutritional products to sportsmen and women. Her dream is to have her own house to improve the wellbeing of her family and her children, and she would like to use the loan to increase her business' capital. 

It is for these reasons that Carmela is requesting a loan: to increase her business' capital and use the profits to improve her childrens' quality of life.

loans.use: to increase her business' capital and use the profits to improve her childrens' quality of life.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: fatten her hogs and support her nine children

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to tend to her coffee crops during this new season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks, posts, and laminated sheets to finish building a room on his home.

loans.name: Maria Ceferina

texts.es: María de 39 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de útiles escolares, venta de ropa y productos plásticos, ella lleva 10 años en el negocio, y vende en toda época del año, con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar las necesidades que se le presentan en su hogar, María solicita un crédito para compra de ropa y útiles escolares por mayor  para mejorar las ventas y asi poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María, age 39, lives with her partner and their two children. For the last ten years, she has been in the business of selling school supplies, clothing, and plastic products. She sells throughout the year. With what she earns, she manages to meet the needs of her household. María is requesting this loan to buy clothing and school supplies on the wholesale market in order to improve her sales and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy clothing and school supplies at wholesale

loans.name: Zeboniso

texts.ru:
Зебонисо трудолюбивая сельская женщина из предгорного района Хуросон. Многие жители ее селения занимаются древними ремеслами, а именно земледелием и животноводством. И семья Зебонисо тоже не исключение. Вот уже 5 лет как Зебонисо занимается разведением скотов. Ей помогают старые родители мужа. Муж Зебонисо по сезонам ездит в Россию на заработки, чтобы зарабатывать и обеспечивать семью.   
У Зебонисо трое детей. Ей в этом году исполнилось 42 года, однако из-за тяжелой жизни в сельской местности она  выглядит чуть старше своего возраста.
В данный момент главной целью Зебонисо является ремонт дома. Она хочет создать хорошие жилищные условия для своей семьи. Уже многие месяцы Зебонисо копит на ремонт и не может накопить достаточной суммы. Сейчас ей не хватает немного суммы, чтобы осуществить свою цель. Зебонисо обратилась в организацию ХУМО с надеждой получить поддержку. Она ответственная женщина и обещает выплачивать кредит в срок за счет своей животноводческой деятельности.
texts.en:
Zeboniso is a hardworking rural woman from a suburban town of Khuroson. Many of the local residents are involved in ancient trades, specifically farming and animal husbandry. And Zeboniso's family is no exception. Zeboniso has been involved in raising livestock for 5 years. Her husband's elderly parents help her. Zeboniso's husband goes to Russia for work seasonally in order to earn a living and provide for the family. Zeboniso has three children. She turned 42 years old this year, but looks a bit older than her age due to the difficult rural life.

Zeboniso's primarily goal at the moment is repairing her house. She wants to create good living conditions for her family. Zeboniso has been saving money to repair the house for months and still has not been able to save the needed amount. She is now short a small amount to achieve her goal. Zeboniso came to the Humo organization with the hope of obtaining support. She is a responsible woman and promises to repay the loan on-time with the earnings from her animal husbandry business.

loans.use: to repair her house in order to improve her family's living conditions

loans.name: Manuel Concepcion

texts.es:
El socio Manuel Concepcion se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida,el socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, el socio hace platos como pollo al horno, sopas entre otros, el sueño del socio es ampliar su negocio de venta de comida. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, pollo y carne.

El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Manuel Concepcion continues to sell food, his work that is helping him to get ahead. He makes dishes like oven-baked chicken, soups, and more. His goal is to expand his business selling food. He will use this loan to buy vegetables, chicken, and beef.

He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making his payments on time.

loans.use: buy ingredients to supply his restaurant

loans.name: Diane

texts.en: Diane is 32 years old. She is married with one child, who is 5 years old. She has a mini-market and has been running this business for the past 5 years. With this loan, she would like to buy more milk, soda and juice to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house and buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: To buy more milk, soda and juice to sell.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente es estudiante de la carrera de Administraciòn de Empresas, tiene tres hermanos, sus padres trabajan y siempre lo han ayudado para poder darle todo lo que necesita 
Le gustaria trabajar en una gran Empresa al culminar sus estudios y ser un gran profesional.
Pide este prestamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios y luchar por su meta.
texts.en:
Vicente is studying for a degree in Business Administration. He has three siblings. His parents work and have always helped to provide everything he needs.

Vicente would like to work for a large company when he finishes his studies and become a successful professional. He is requesting a loan so that he can invest in the payment of his university fees. This would allow him to continue his studies and strive toward his goal.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Analyn is 26 years old and has one child who is in school.

Analyn has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a 6,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.

Analyn has been in this business for one year. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Zaida Mariuxi

texts.es:
Zaida tiene 31 años de edad vive en el cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos estado civil soltero ella vive con su familia y sus 2 hijos de 13-5 años de edad.
